geomexport.gui.text.create_selection: You must create a selection before exporting it.
geomexport.gui.text.navigate_folder: Navigate to a folder to export to.
geomexport.gui.text.confirm_export: This may overwrite any files in the selected directory. Are you sure you want to proceed?
geomexport.message.export_failure: Failed to export selection. More information can be found the the logfile.
